message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. My initial offer for the product is $9,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I believe that's a fair price for the product.
I understand you're looking for a fair price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so my counteroffer is $8,500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm afraid I have to stick with my previous offer. I'm willing to pay $8,000 for the product.
I see you're still interested in the product, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to compromise further. My next offer is $8,800.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm afraid I have to stay firm on my previous offer. I'm willing to pay $8,000 for the product.
